label: Biceps
short_description: Front of the upper arm; primary elbow flexor.

label: Forearms
short_description: Muscles of the lower arm; controls wrist and finger movement.

label: Grip
short_description: Intrinsic and extrinsic muscles responsible for hand strength.

label: Triceps
short_description: Back of the upper arm; primary elbow extensor.

label: Lats
short_description: Large wing-like muscles on the sides of the mid-back.

label: Lower Back
short_description: Muscles supporting the lumbar spine and trunk extension.

label: Mid Back
short_description: Muscles located between the shoulder blades.

label: Rhomboids
short_description: Specific muscles for scapular retraction and stability.

label: Traps
short_description: Large muscle extending from the neck to the mid-back.

label: Upper Back
short_description: The cluster of muscles covering the top of the rib cage.

label: Lower Chest
short_description: The bottom portion of the pectoralis major.

label: Mid Chest
short_description: The largest, central portion of the chest muscle.

label: Upper Chest
short_description: The top section of the chest near the collarbone.

label: Abs
short_description: The front abdominal wall ("six-pack").

label: Hip Flexors
short_description: Muscles that pull the knee toward the chest.

label: Obliques
short_description: The side muscles of the abdomen used for rotation.

label: Calves
short_description: The muscles on the back of the lower leg.

label: Glutes
short_description: The muscles of the buttocks; primary hip extensors.

label: Hamstrings
short_description: The back of the thigh; responsible for knee flexion.

label: Inner Thighs
short_description: Muscles responsible for pulling the legs together.

label: Outer Hips/Thighs
short_description: Muscles that move the legs away from the midline.

label: Quads
short_description: The four large muscles on the front of the thigh.

label: Front Delts
short_description: The front part of the shoulder muscle.

label: Rear Delts
short_description: The back part of the shoulder muscle.

label: Rotator Cuff
short_description: Group of muscles/tendons that stabilize the shoulder.

label: Side Delts
short_description: The middle part of the shoulder providing width.
